dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The data was collected by mounted cameras on a vehicle in Oxford, UK. The dataset includes over 100 repetitions of a consistent route spanning over a year, covering various seasons, weather, and times of the day.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Skrede
dcterms:description: The images were collected by a mounted camera on the Nordland Railway in Norway across seasons. The dataset includes images from winter and summer, focusing on strong conditional variations.
dcterms:title: Nordland Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
R. Feng
H. Zhang
dcterms:description: A forward-facing camera collected the images on a mobile robot teleoperated on a university campus covering the same route of 650 meters, with sequences collected at different times on the same day.
dcterms:title: UAcampus Dataset
